statements: Front end expert having 4 years of work experience
Proficient with front end development skills like HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Experienced in working with Angular 2+ framework along with Material Design and RxJS
Practiced source control management in Git and Tortoise SVN
Keenly interested in design and development of client side webpages

description.title: ENOVIA PLM
overviews: ENOVIA is a Product Lifecycle Management software which is developed and maintained by Dassault Systems
This project involves development and support of two modules of ENOVIA PLM, namely ENOVIA Costing and Analytics Foundation and ENOVIA Buyer Analytics
The former module enables user to analyze the cost of an object right from where it has been created up to its time of release
The latter module helps user decide the best supplier for the materials quoted for outsourcing
responsibilities: Initiate and monitor the installation of client software on the server grade as well as the local machines
Setup of Oracle 12C Database, creation of one container and three pluggable databases and configuration of the same
Generate and test scripts to enforce automation of most repeated procedures during the installation and post installation of the software
Implementation of functional enhancements requested by client
Development, testing and handover of the final deliverables
Testing of the application and generation of appropriate reports
Creation and maintenance of documents concerned with project, training and practice

description.title: TopHat Industries Limited
overviews: TopHat is a UK based housing & real estate business corporation which relies on data stored in the Excel format to keep track of various activities
This project required development of inventory management and payroll calculation modules
The inventory management and payroll calculation modules involved numerous manual input from the user which resulted in inaccurate results much often
Additionally, TopHat Corporate Limited wanted to develop and deploy their official website on the Internet using WordPress
responsibilities: Analysis of existing formats of Excel Workbooks used by TopHat and suggest modifications which would aid accuracy of the data
Design of VBA Macros to perform automation of the Excel Workbooks to populate and update those fields which did not necessarily require inputs from the user
Handle the updating of interlinked data from operations tracker and inventory management workbooks to align it with the Project Plan Gantt Chart
Computation of Employee Payroll based on attendance
Deployment of TopHat Website on the internet using WordPress
